description: Comprehensive Phase 2 validator rewrite: implemented 8 validation layers (structural, type, warnings, action_candidates, safety cross-checks with Phase 1). New schema enforces 6 required top-level keys (cluster_summary, patterns, warnings, action_candidates, priorities, limitations) with strict field validation. Safety layer prevents resize actions on unsafe deployments and requires limitations to reference insufficient_data from Phase 1. All 60 tests passing.

Phase 3 Web UI complete redesign: Changed port from 5000 to 8080. Redesigned dashboard with comprehensive 3-tab interface. TAB 1 (Facts & Evidence): 6 sections - Cluster Overview, Cluster Patterns, Deployments Table, Deployment Details (drill-down), HPA Analysis, Node Pools. TAB 2 (Insights LLM): 6 sections - Cluster Summary, Patterns Detected, Warnings, Action Candidates, Prioritization, Limitations. TAB 3 (Raw JSON): Toggle buttons for analysis_output.json and insights_output.json. Design principle: Phase 1 shows the truth (facts), Phase 2 explains the truth (insights), UI never mixes them. All sections follow strict separation with color-coded badges, tables, drill-downs, and responsive layout.

UI revert: Reverted to simple placeholder dashboard after encountering template data structure mismatches. Created minimal info page indicating UI under development. Phase 1 analysis and Phase 2 LLM pipeline remain fully functional. Placeholder provides instructions for running analysis and notes on data locations. Fresh UI redesign scheduled for next iteration with proper template structure verification.

Output directory reorganization: Created output/ directory for all analysis and insights output files. Updated ANALYSIS_OUTPUT_PATH and INSIGHTS_OUTPUT_PATH in config.py to use output/ subdirectory. Modified orchestrator.py to auto-create output directory on write. Updated ui.py to load files from output/. Created examples/ directory with sample_analysis.json and sample_insights.json demonstrating output format. Added documentation (README.md) for both output/ and examples/ directories. Enables clean separation of generated files from source code.

Phase 1 scope lock enforcement: Removed all Phase 2 and Phase 3 code per strict scope lock. Deleted phase2/ directory (validator.py, runner.py, llm_client.py) and phase3/ directory entirely. Removed Phase 2/3 test files (test_phase2.py, test_e2e.py, test_discovery.py, test_prometheus_client.py). Removed ui.py (Flask) and templates/ directory. Removed Flask and Jinja2 from requirements.txt. Cleaned config.py removing PHASE2_ENABLED, INSIGHTS_OUTPUT_PATH, LLM_* settings, and PHASE2_LLM_PROMPT. Completely rewrote readme.md as Phase-1-only documentation with architecture, configuration, testing, and extension guidance. Updated orchestrator.py comments and verified all 22 Phase 1 tests still passing. System now Phase 1 pure analysis only: deterministic facts and flags from Prometheus, no LLM, no UI, no suggestions.
